name: Be There Or Be Square (Lasriel)
description:
Jump through different obstacles or use them to your advantage to reach the goal.

Controls

Use the mouse cursor to aim at the direction you want the player to jump at.

[Space] - Tap to perform a small jump | Hold to charge up stronger jump

[R] - Teleport player to spawn

Obstacles

Green blocks are solid without any extra effects.

Orange blocks are bouncy.

Blue blocks pull player towards them.

Red blocks push player away from them.

Goal block is checkerboard patterned block that player needs to get to in order to finish the level.

FAQ

Q: Game Jam theme was about cubes so why are you using squares instead?

A: They are cubes, just in top down perspective. Trust me :)

Made in 4 days.
